job_description:
• Telephony skills, such as adherence to NEC regulations for cable applications, and familiarity with cable installation, termination, and testing standards.
• Actively pursuing a Bachelor’s degree or a Master’s degree or equivalent experience in Information Technology, Information Systems, or a related field.
• Attending coordination and project review meetings to determine and meet communication needs and project schedules.
• Outstanding written communication, careful documentation skills, and attentive listening abilities.
• Basic networking knowledge, including console access, link states, and basic switchport configuration concepts.
• Suggesting proven methods to improve supported services.
• Ability to read and understand blueprints.
• Cannot graduate before September 2026.
